name: IKDeviceBrowserViewDelegate
desc: The IKDeviceBrowserViewDelegate defines the methods that the delegate of the IKDeviceBrowserView class can implement. All the methods are optional.

items.name: func deviceBrowserView(IKDeviceBrowserView!, selectionDidChange: ICDevice!)
items.desc: Sent to the delegate when the selection changes in the browser view.

items.name: func deviceBrowserView(IKDeviceBrowserView!, didEncounterError: Error!)
items.desc: Invoked when the device browser encounters an error.
